text: Cassam Uteem, GCSK (born 22 March 1941) is a Mauritian politician. He was President of Mauritius from 30 June 1992 to 15 February 2002 and is the longest serving President of Mauritius, having served for nine years. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Mauritius
title: Cassam Uteem
